statements: SELECT * FROM call_volume_trends;
SELECT caller_id, call_timestamp FROM call_volume_trends ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_trends WHERE caller_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT id, call_duration FROM call_volume_trends WHERE call_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM call_volume_trends ORDER BY call_duration DESC, call_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_trends WHERE caller_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_id, EXTRACT(DAY FROM call_timestamp) AS day, COUNT(*) AS call_count FROM call_volume_trends GROUP BY caller_id, day ORDER BY call_count DESC;
SELECT caller_id, SUM(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM call_duration)) AS total_duration_minutes FROM call_volume_trends GROUP BY caller_id;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_trends WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM call_timestamp) = 9 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM call_timestamp) = 2021;
SELECT caller_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM call_duration)) AS average_call_duration FROM call_volume_trends GROUP BY caller_id ORDER BY average_call_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data;
SELECT call_time, call_duration FROM call_volume_data ORDER BY call_time DESC;
SELECT call_id, call_type FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT allocation_id, allocated_resources FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY peak_support_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data ORDER BY call_time DESC, call_duration ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT call_type, AVG(call_duration) AS average_duration FROM call_volume_data GROUP BY call_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY average_duration DESC;
SELECT r.*, c.call_duration FROM resource_allocation r JOIN call_volume_data c ON r.allocation_id = c.call_id WHERE r.allocated_resources > 50 ORDER BY r.peak_support_time ASC, c.call_duration DESC;
SELECT call_type, COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_time >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY call_type HAVING total_calls > 10 ORDER BY total_calls DESC;
SELECT r.*, c.* FROM resource_allocation r LEFT JOIN call_volume_data c ON r.allocation_id = c.call_id WHERE r.allocated_resources < 100 ORDER BY r.allocation_date ASC, c.call_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT call_id, call_timestamp, call_duration FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_type = 'inbound' ORDER BY call_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, agent_skill FROM agent_data WHERE agent_skill = 'Expert';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT call_timestamp, call_duration FROM call_volume_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY call_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT call_timestamp, agent_id, customer_id, call_duration FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_type = 'Inbound' ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_skill FROM agent_data WHERE agent_skill = 'Sales' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT agent_id, allocated_time, deallocated_time FROM resource_allocation WHERE deallocated_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY allocated_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND call_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6';
SELECT COUNT(agent_id), agent_skill FROM agent_data GROUP BY agent_skill HAVING COUNT(agent_id) > 3 ORDER BY agent_skill DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_id, call_duration FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT peak_reason, peak_duration FROM peak_times WHERE peak_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT peak_timestamp FROM peak_times WHERE peak_reason = 'high_call_volume' ORDER BY peak_timestamp ASC;
SELECT resource_name, availability_status FROM support_resources WHERE availability_status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM call_volume_data ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT peak_duration, peak_reason FROM peak_times WHERE peak_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY peak_duration ASC;
SELECT resource_name, availability_status FROM support_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Engineer' ORDER BY resource_name;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM support_schedule WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT caller_id, call_duration FROM call_volume_data WHERE call_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND caller_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY call_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM calls;
SELECT caller_id, call_duration FROM calls ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE department='Technical Support';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM call_logs WHERE agent_id=2 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM calls WHERE call_duration > 10 ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT call_id, caller_id, call_duration FROM calls WHERE call_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND caller_id = 123;

SELECT c.call_id, c.call_duration, s.agent_name, d.department_name FROM calls c INNER JOIN call_logs cl ON c.call_id = cl.call_id INNER JOIN support_agents s ON cl.agent_id = s.agent_id INNER JOIN departments d ON s.department = d.department_name;
SELECT count(*) AS total_calls, HOUR(call_timestamp) AS hour FROM calls GROUP BY HOUR(call_timestamp);
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration FROM calls;
